name: slovenly shopper
description:
"I need to go shopping but I haven't showered in days. It would be SO EMBARRASSING to run into someone I know, but as they say… IT'S A SMALL WORLD!!!!"

Controls:

  • Move with ARROW KEYS
  • Wait with Z
  • Pickup Grocery with X
  • Crouch with C

a game for Ludum Dare 38 by jelch

with art by Elsiana Eaves

and music by Giovanni J Mendoza-cruz
